task.name: FileTrigger
task.description: This task monitors a folder (FOLDER_TO_MONITOR) on a given HOST. It searches for files according to the pattern FILENAME_PATTERN_TO_MONITOR and is unblocked when at least one file is found. The task returns the list of file paths found as result.
